See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 2001-2008 Openbravo, S.L. * * Specifically, this derivative work is based upon the following Compiere * file and version. ************************************************************************* * $Id: C_BPartner_RemitLocation.SQL,v 1.2 2003/02/20 06:42:12 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Return the first RemitTo C_Location_ID of a Business Partner * Description: * ************************************************************************/ v_C_Location_ID NUMBER:=NULL; TYPE RECORD IS REF CURSOR; CUR_BPLoc RECORD; BEGIN FOR CUR_BPLoc IN (SELECT IsRemitTo, C_Location_ID FROM C_BPartner_Location WHERE C_BPartner_ID=p_C_BPartner_ID ORDER BY IsRemitTo DESC ) LOOP IF(v_C_Location_ID IS NULL) THEN v_C_Location_ID:=CUR_BPLoc.C_Location_ID; END IF; END LOOP; RETURN v_C_Location_ID; END C_BPARTNER_REMITLOCATION
